entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023
